title: Joomla turns 16 and looks back on the evolution of the CMS market
author: techradar-pro
summary: The CMS market is about more than just web content management
article: Over the years, open-source content management system (CMS) Joomla has built its brand on a model-view-controller web application framework that can be used independently, and now holds a 4.9% share of the CMS market.
Joomla relies on its community of developers and volunteers to make the platform accessible globally, in order to power millions of websites.

With Zion Market Research reporting that the CMS market set to reach $123bn by 2026, Brian Teeman, co-founder of Joomla, dives into the nitty gritty of the sector so far and shares what’s to come with TechRadar Pro.
